entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
